name: @loopback/testlab
description: A collection of test utilities we use to write LoopBack tests.

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:lib6
scripts.clean: rm -f loopback-testlab*.tgz && rm -rf lib* && rm -rf package
scripts.verify: npm pack && tar xf loopback-testlab*.tgz && tree package && npm run clean

author: IBM
